article:
'City of federal subject significance' is an umbrella term used to refer to a
type of an administrative division of a federal subject of Russia which is equal
in status to a district but is organized around a large city; occasionally with
surrounding rural territories.

According to the 1993 Constitution of Russia, the administrative-territorial
structure of the federal subjects is not identified as the responsibility of the
federal government or as the joint responsibility of the federal government and
the federal subjects. "Ð­Ð½ÑÐ¸ÐºÐ»Ð¾Ð¿ÐµÐ´Ð¸ÑÐµÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹ ÑÐ»Ð¾Ð²Ð°ÑÑ
ÐºÐ¾Ð½ÑÑÐ¸ÑÑÑÐ¸Ð¾Ð½Ð½Ð¾Ð³Ð¾ Ð¿ÑÐ°Ð²Ð°". Ð¡ÑÐ°ÑÑÑ "ÐÐ´Ð¼Ð¸Ð½Ð¸ÑÑÑÐ°ÑÐ¸Ð²Ð½Ð¾-ÑÐµÑÑÐ¸ÑÐ¾ÑÐ¸Ð°Ð»ÑÐ½Ð¾Ðµ ÑÑÑÑÐ¾Ð¹ÑÑÐ²Ð¾".
Ð¡Ð¾ÑÑ. Ð. Ð. ÐÐ·Ð±ÑÐ°Ð½Ð¾Ð². â ÐÐ½.: ÐÐ·Ð´. Ð.Ð. Ð¡ÑÑÐ¾Ð², 2001. This
state of the matters is traditionally interpreted by the governments of the
federal subjects as a sign that the matters of the administrative-territorial
divisions are the sole responsibility of the federal subjects themselves. As a result, the modern administrative-territorial
structures of the federal subjects vary significantly from one federal subject
to another; that includes the manner in which the cities of federal subject
significance are organized and the choice of a term to refer to such entities.
In the federal subjects which have closed administrative-territorial formations,
those are often given a similar status. Occasionally, this status is also given
to the areas organized around the inhabited localities which are not cities, but
smaller urban-type settlements.

As of 2013, the following types of such entities are recognized:

;in the republics: *Administrative-territorial formation with special status ():
in the Republic of Kalmykia *City (): in the Republics of Dagestan, Kalmykia,
and Khakassia. *City of republic significance (: in the Republic of
Bashkortostan, Republic of Buryatia, Chechen Republic, Chuvash Republic,
Republic of Ingushetia, Kabardino-Balkar Republic, KarachayâCherkess Republic,
Republic of Karelia, Komi Republic, Mari El Republic, Republic of Mordovia,
Republic of Tatarstan, and Udmurt Republic. *City under republic jurisdiction
(): in the Sakha Republic and the Republic of North OssetiaâAlania. *City under
republic jurisdiction (urban okrug) (): in the Tuva Republic. *Closed administrative-
territorial formation (): in the Republic of Bashkortostan. *Republican urban
okrug (): in the Republic of Adygea. *Urban okrug (): in the Altai Republic.

;in the krais: *City (): in Krasnodar Krai. *City of krai significance (): in
Altai, Khabarovsk, Perm, and Stavropol Krais. *City under krai jurisdiction ():
in Kamchatka and Primorsky Krais. *Closed administrative-territorial formation
(): in Altai, Krasnoyarsk, and Perm Krais. *Krai city (): in Krasnoyarsk Krai.

;in the oblasts: *City (): in Chelyabinsk, Irkutsk, Ivanovo, Kaluga, Kirov,
Murmansk, Novosibirsk, Orenburg, Pskov, Sverdlovsk, Tyumen, and Vladimir
Oblasts. *City of oblast significance (): in Arkhangelsk, Astrakhan, Belgorod,
Kaliningrad, Kostroma, Kursk, Magadan, Nizhny Novgorod, Novgorod, Omsk, Oryol,
Penza, Ryazan, Sakhalin, Samara, Saratov, Tambov, Ulyanovsk, Volgograd, Vologda,
and Yaroslavl Oblasts. *City under oblast jurisdiction (): in Kemerovo, Kurgan,
Lipetsk, Moscow, Tomsk, and Tula Oblasts. *City with the jurisdictional
territory (): in Murmansk Oblast. *Closed administrative-territorial formation
(): in Astrakhan, Kirov, Moscow, Murmansk, Orenburg, Saratov, Sverdlovsk, and
Vladimir Oblasts. *Municipal formation with urban okrug status (): in Leningrad
Oblast. *Okrug (): in Tver Oblast. *Urban administrative okrug/city of oblast
significance (): in Bryansk Oblast *Urban-type settlement of oblast significance
(): in Chelyabinsk and Kaliningrad Oblasts. *Urban-type settlement under oblast
jurisdiction (): in Kemerovo Oblast. *Urban okrug (): in Amur, Rostov, Smolensk,
and Voronezh Oblast.

;in the autonomous okrugs: *City of okrug significance (): in Chukotka, Khanty-
Mansi, Nenets, and Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrugs.

;in the Jewish Autonomous Oblast: *City of oblast significance ().
